TopicTitle: My First Successful Mun Landing + Return :D

Articles.Content:
I finally did it! This was a huge milestone for me. I recorded it and added the video on the Tube of You for your (yeah right : ) entertainment.

Part 1 (Launch and Munar Approach)

Part 2 (Munar Landing and Return)

Congratz and welcome!

Video quality was a bit low, but did I read 43 G\'s at the end of the mission? I\'m thinking that happened due to the steep re-entry angle, I suggest next time you burn to make your re-entry orbit remain elliptical but with a Periapsis (PE) of 30 - 35 km, this shallower angle will let you go back home with less painful G\'s (3-4 G\'s)

Keep up the good work!

Thanks!

Yeah vid quality is low becasue i dont make enough videos to warrant buying FRAPS for $30. So instead, I use Camstudio

(with 2gb limit that makes me limit vid quality)

Thanks for the feedback!

Congratulations and welcome!

Oh boy, my first time landing was a thrill! I spent SO LONG trying and redoing every approach!

Good job man and wonderful videos! I\'d love to see more!

Again, welcome!

Your friendly neighborhood bag of bones,

-Drakomis

[mod]Moved to proper forum so everyone can see the great quality of introduction[/mod]
Thanks! I wasn\'t sure which topic to put this thread in so thanks for the move.

Thanks! I wasn\'t sure which topic to put this thread in so thanks for the move.

Welcome! That\'s what we\'re here for.
